QuestData.Title: Emissary
QuestData.Description: As if things weren't unsettled enough, guests have arrived... the Illidari.$b$bThese demon hunters have been imprisoned since their master's fall at the Black Temple. For the Wardens to release them can only mean the peril is dire indeed.$b$bTheir delegation's leader, Allari "the Souleater," claims Orgimmar faces a hidden threat. I gave them leave to establish a camp within the city... for now.$B$BYou will speak with her at once. Find out whether this threat is credible.
